metadata.title: CVE-2024-47683 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:

If detected, keep checking whether the stream is already oncurrent state or not.

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-47683` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
